title: Free transfers from NA to OCE

replies.body: It's nice of you guys to mention the game modes.
Transfer to oceania guys players are so friendly {{champion:35}}
This is bs. Most of OCE aint kind
thus the {{champion:35}} picture...
Yes, I've noticed a dramatic increase in the number of trolls lately.

DOMINION!!!! Where for art thou Dominion? Meet me tomorrow at 8pm for some custom games of Dominion! 

[http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/ILg0HrE2-domination-day]

Sorry if this seems imposing, Just trying to get some OCE-Dominion going.
I support this! :)

Would prefer free human transfer to NA please.
Will work as garbage man, coffee maker etc for riot employees.
Thankyou
I literally just paid for this! :( @Riot, refund pls!
Check you account. Players in this situation should have received a refund automatically. If not, please contact player support.
I am Oce server... but seriously who the hell wants to transfer to Oce.
People that want lower ping?

With less features and support.

It's not as clear cut a decision as it should be.
A 200 ping difference is clear...

Well I transfered to OCE when they when it first was released and they were offereing pool party ziggs but I was not one to recieve it and I had to cover up my guilt and buy it instead... It was a shameful time and I wish riot would've just gave me the skin instead of drowning me in the guilt of being the odd one out without that skin.
I just paid $20 to get my NA account to OCE... then 24 hours later you pull this shit?? I want my fucking money back, that's bullshit
Check you account. Players in this situation should have received a refund automatically. If not, please contact player support.
If you actually read the full description you might see that it says you get refunded...
We need more transfers over here. Oce players are all toxic. 99% of them
All, or 99%?
actually 75%
you say something like happy birthday then you get people saying stfu or go die, great community rito

What about players in Asia that are affected just the same as OCE players with the move. My NA account now has 250-300 ping but moving to OCE is a massive downgrade (restricted maps, less ranked play time because of timezone au/asia).  Can't move to Taiwan or China server as both in Chinese. Only speak english... what to do? I feel we getting screwed :(
Learn Chinese
give up speaking english, there gold medal advice
Can I use this to transfer an old NA smurf to OCE? It's not showing as free transfer from NA
I'm sure if you contact PS they will be able to help you out.
riot whys there no free skin like when oce came up? Seems like more inconvenience for oce players and it's at least a minimum if precedence is followed.
why cant we just have the same game modes as Na and all that stuff, it would make life a lot easier{{item:3070}}

that cant happen because the "quality" of the queue's would be bad (like its not already lol) and i actually agree with the fact queue times would be insanely long (around 30+ mins assuming you dont get a queue dodger.
i am trying to transfer my na acct to oce but it still cost 2600 rp
me too ? why ?
my another account is in the NA, I want to transfer to OC, but it is nor free.why ?
Hey Riot I'm trying to get my friends from na to oce but they said it costs 2600RP please help thx.
Hey im trying to Transfer my smurf account from Na to Oce and it isnt coming up as free? Support didnt help at all I was wondering if anyone would be able to :)
Its been Years since i played dominion... what is it anymore... rip in pip oce server
Had to pay to transfer from NA to OCE as that wasn't offered to us that live in Japan. Not fair. {{item:3151}}
I can finally move my other account to OCE from NA I miss you. I always have :(
if im in canada, and i accidently made a oceanic account, is there a way to transfer to NA? cause i spent money on this account :/ i dont have enough money to buy a transfer
No way unless you pay 2600rp to get transferred back to NA
Try contact Player Support. If it is a genuine mistake I'm sure we can sort something out.
won't let me transfer my NA account. says its 2600rp

THANKS RIOT
I seriously thought that I had lost my NA account :DD:D:D:D:
Where's the free skin associated with the transfer? Like every time you've compensated oceania players for further inconveniences?
Riot , just make a free transfer from Oceania to any server plsssssssssssss{{champion:32}}
which server do you want to go to.

Yes transfer like many of us did years ago when we got fucked into a free transfer and also a pool party ziggs skin to cover up the fact OCE is a plague.

Riots also forgetting to mention you'll need to learn chinese to play from 10pm AEST - 3:30AM AEST or you will be reported for failing to communicate with your team.

And from 2pm AEST - 10PM AEST you will have to endure every 11 year old's {{champion:86}} , {{champion:82}} and{{champion:19}} builds in solo Que,

This seems like a magic trick {{champion:35}}
Rito Can u add free transfer from Oce to Na pls ... i am from Bulgaria in Europe btw my friend are in Na..               (soz my engilish isnt good)
how can i get free transfer for OCE to NA..i wanna come back to NA again..plz help me
I DIDN' GET THIS ! MY NA ACCOUNT : Yodainme Naruto . PLEASE IT DIDN'T SHOW 0 RP.
